page.title: 18Caravan Site : Clifton
page.content: The Caravan Site has tents as well as caravans and people come from all over the world to stay. In 1984 there were visitors from 36 different countries staying on the site, including eastern block countries. At the moment this is a rural site within easy reach of York but building is scheduled to completely surround it.On vandalism Mr Herbert the owner told us that damage is caused by cigarette burns and people deliberately defacing property. He welcomes the new ring road. At one time it was scheduled to pass through the site but now it will be very convenient for visitors to reach the site. The site has facilities such as 2 toilet blocks,club rooms,games rooms and children's play areas.The site holds 155 caravans and tents and is a popular place for the local population as well as visitors.
